author: sahan
msg: 1. Adding xml schema support to the axis2_svc and axis2_msg
2. Enabling REST GET case in both client side and server side

author: ruchithf
msg: - Makesure the STS cert doesn't expire for the next 10 years

author: trustin
msg: Fixed issue: DIRMINA-219 (Example test cases fail on IBM JVM due to lacking SSL algorithms)
* Changed BogusSSLContextFactory to accept other key manager factory algorithms than SunX509

author: kahatlen
msg: The problem occurs when the test has opened four connections, closes
three of them and runs getRuntimeInfo() on the server. The test
expects that there is one active session on the server, but in some
cases, the network server has not had enough time to clean up after
the closed connections, and more sessions are listed as active.
The patch solves this timing issue by invoking Thread.sleep(1000)
